settings.title:
Introducing Fièra
Finishing Powder Brush
settings.sub_title: Use this gentle brush with our HD Finishing powder for a flawless finish to your makeup routine.
settings.content: Our FINISHING POWDER BRUSH is the softest, yet most effective brush that pairs perfectly with our HD FINISHING POWDER for an even, smooth and gorgeous application.

settings.title: How Fièra <br class="forMob"> Finishing  Powder Brush Works
settings.sub_title: The Fièra Powder Brush has been custom designed to pair perfectly with our Fièra HD Matte Finishing Powder giving you quick, easy and flawless application.
settings.content_1: Our brush has been custom designed to help you apply Fièra FINISHING POWDER quickly and easily.
settings.content_2: Easiest way to thoroughly and evenly apply your finishing powder.
settings.content_3: The finishing powder brush can be easily cleaned even with heavy use.
settings.content_4: We love animals. All Fièra products are 100% cruelty free.

settings.title: Our Fièra Promise
settings.content: Fièra is not your average beauty line. We offer the highest quality products with unstoppable results. Our products focus on delivering innovative science, quality, and convenience. Not just a beauty brand, Fièra is committed to supporting our community through our partnerships with Food Rescue US and Second Harvest by donating a portion of our sales to help feed those in need.
Place a small amount of powder onto the end of your brush
Gently sweep it over the blemished areas
For dark circles and fine lines, start from the center of your face and move outwards

settings.title: 30 Day Money Back Guarantee
settings.content: We’re so confident you'll love our Fièra products we offer a Hassle-free 30 day Money Back Guarantee. If you're not satisfied with your purchase simply return the items back to us for a full refund less shipping costs.
